title: The Waste Of Suns
lyrics:
Tell the best of it

The waste of suns

The sight of wrongs

The seasons wait for you

Oh, I waited for you

Coming down

The saviour's own

Like sleeping homes

Dark words, loss

Dark grace's cost

To stay with me

To stay to see

Til the fire
